meanings.definition: A class of drugs that include illegal substances like heroin, as well as legal prescription pain relievers like oxycodone, hydrocodone, codeine, morphine, and fentanyl.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed opioids to manage the patient's severe pain.
meanings.sent2: Many people misuse opioids, leading to serious health consequences.
meanings.sent3: The party clown accidentally used opioids instead of confetti, causing a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her addiction to opioids was like being trapped in a dark tunnel with no way out.
meanings.sent5: The dangers of opioids lurked behind the innocent-looking pills.

meanings.definition: Any natural or synthetic substance that has similar effects to these drugs.
meanings.sent1: The herbal supplement claimed to have the same benefits as opioids without the side effects.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying new compounds that mimic the effects of opioids.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added opioids to the recipe, resulting in an unexpectedly relaxing meal.
meanings.sent4: His love for adventure was like an opioid, providing a temporary escape from reality.
meanings.sent5: The allure of opioids beckoned with promises of relief and euphoria.
